sentences.en: But they are not lords of the manor there now.
sentences.cn: 可他们现在并不是那块庄园的主人了.

sentences.en: By fits she was elated at the notion of being lady of the manor.
sentences.cn: 有时候,她一想到自己是个女领主就得意洋洋.

sentences.en: Dragon manor senior clubs set the function of advanced SPA, chess room, restaurant, conference room and other areas.
sentences.cn: 龙脉庄园高级会所集合了高级SPA、棋牌室、餐厅、会议室等多种功能区域。

sentences.en: Every village has a green, a church, a pub and a manor house.
sentences.cn: 每个村庄都有一片绿地、一座教堂、一间酒馆和一座庄园宅第。

sentences.en: Fitzpiers reached the edge of the glen overlooking the manor - house.
sentences.cn: 菲茨比尔斯走到俯瞰着那座庄园府第的峡谷边缘.

sentences.en: It brings the tranquil, leisurely and healthy manor feelings for primitive nature.
sentences.cn: 将恬静 、 悠闲、健康的庄园情怀融入最原始的自然.

sentences.en: It was the quintessence of an English manor house.
sentences.cn: 那是典型的英式庄园宅第。

sentences.en: One of the schools in the district was situated on the manor.
sentences.cn: 这个区里的一所学校位于这块永久租地.

sentences.en: She had, in fact, seen Fitzpiers take the direction of the manor - house.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 她已经看见菲茨尔斯是朝着庄园府邸的方向去了.

sentences.en: Thank God they're not on my manor any more.
sentences.cn: 谢天谢地，他们再也不在我的辖区里了。

sentences.en: The castle dates from the 1500s and has a rustic charm, reminiscent of a grand West Country manor.
sentences.cn: 城堡的历史可追溯到1500年代，极富乡村魅力，令人回忆起西南各郡的庄园。

sentences.en: The Chief Constable deeply resented any intrusions into his manor.
sentences.cn: 警察局局长对侵入其辖区的行为深恶痛绝。

sentences.en: The Manor is for sale at a negotiable price.
sentences.cn: 该庄园现在出售，价格可议。

sentences.en: They were unanimous that Chortlesby Manor must be preserved.
sentences.cn: 他们一致认为必须对乔特勒斯比庄园加以保护。

sentences.en: Thieves broke into the manor at night.
We returned to Crabbree Manor in high spirits.
sentences.cn: 我们精神振奋地回到了楂园.

sentences.en: Why do we have a manor?

phrases.tran_cn: n. 领主之宅邸；庄园主的住宅

trans.tran_cn: 庄园，领地，庄园大厦，庄园主的住宅
trans.tran_en: a big old house with a large area of land around it
